artifact.content: Event: The user wishes to speak to another user in the system. System: The system consists of the phones and server. Actors: - Caller - Callee - Server Overview: A user can act as a caller and make a phone call to another user in the system - making them the callee. The caller picks up the phone and dials the extension of the callee to make the voice connection. When the conversation is done, both users hang up their phones.

Event: Administrator wishes to add a user, cancel a user, or change a user�s privileges or phones. System: The system consists of the graphical user interface system (GUI), the user records, and the extension number to IP mapping. Actors: - Administrator Overview: Administrator views user accounts and has the option to add a new user or edit a user�s account. Editing a user�s account allows the administrator to change the account privileges, or the phones associated with the account.

Event: Administrator performs administrative actions such as resetting call processing software of a phone line, checking all the phone systems by running periodic tests, resetting the acceptable load of the system, viewing the system load. System: The system consists of the phones and system and Administrator. Actors: - System - Administrator Overview: This use case captures the scenarios where administrator validates the capability of the system.

Event: User logs on to his/her voice messages account and listens to the new or archived messages. Actors: - User - System Overview: This use case captures the scenarios where user logs on the voice message account, and listens to the new or archived messages. After hearing each message, user has the option to delete or save the message.

Event: The Administrator sends bills to show service charges. System: The system consists of the phones and system. Actors: - Administrator - System Overview: The Administrator requests the bills from the system. The email and paper version of the bills are given to the departments.

Event: Add credit to the department�s bill System: The system consists of the phones and system. Actors: - User - Administrator - System Overview: Department sends money to the Administrator who updates the system to add credit to the department�s bill

Event: Issue bill to users with outstanding balance System: The system consists of the phones and system. Actors: - Administrator - System
Overview: Handles the case where the department has not paid his bill for one full period

Event: The administrator views IP Phone hardware status and choose to add or delete an IP Phone. System: The system is the server and phones. Actors: - Administrator - System
Overview: The Administrator wishes to see the IP Phone status and choose to add and delete an IP Phone. Adding an IP phone is for the system to search a new IP Phone. To delete and IP phone the administrator must make sure that no extension is associated with that phone. If that is the case, system shows an error message.
